activities.description: Learn and practice vocabulary related to startup concepts.  The AI will provide a list of 10 startup terms. For each term, the student will provide a Chinese translation, and the AI will provide feedback on accuracy. The AI will then generate example sentences using the vocabulary.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: We've developed a prototype for the new app.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们为新应用开发了一个原型。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen wèi xīn yìngyòng kāifāle yígè yuánxíng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: We're looking for investors to help fund our startup.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们正在寻找投资者帮助资助我们的创业公司。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen zhèngzài xúnzhǎo tóuzhě bāngzhù zīzhù wǒmen de chuàngyè gōngsī.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: Securing funding is crucial for any startup.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 获得资金对于任何创业公司来说都是至关重要的。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Huòdé zījīn duìyú rènhé chuàngyè gōngsī láishuō dōu shì zhìguān zhòngyào de.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: We aim to capture a significant market share in the next year.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们计划在明年获得显著的市场份额。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen jìhuà zài míngnián huòdé xiǎnzhù de shìchǎng fèngé.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: The startup generated substantial revenue in its first year.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 这家创业公司在其第一年获得了可观的收入。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Zhè jiā chuàngyè gōngsī zài qí dì yī nián huòdéle kěguān de shōurù.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: Our business model is scalable and can handle significant growth.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们的商业模式是可扩展的，并且能够应对显著的增长。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen de shāngyè móshì shì kě kuòzhàn de, bìngqiě nénggòu yìngyìng xiǎnzhù de zēngzhǎng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: We're seeking venture capital to fuel our growth.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们正在寻求风险投资来推动我们的增长。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen zhèngzài xúnqiú fēngxiǎn tóuzī lái tuīdòng wǒmen de zēngzhǎng.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: Sustained growth is essential for any successful startup.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 持续的增长对于任何成功的创业公司来说都是至关重要的。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Chíxù de zēngzhǎng duìyú rènhé chénggōng de chuàngyè gōngsī láishuō dōu shì zhìguān zhòngyào de.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: Our product is innovative and addresses a key market need.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们的产品具有创新性，并满足了关键的市场需求。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen de chǎnpin jùyǒu chuàngxīn xìng, bìng mǎnzúle guānjiàn de shìchǎng xūqiú.

vocabulary.example_sentence_en: We have a highly skilled and motivated team.
vocabulary.example_sentence_zh: 我们拥有一支高技能且积极主动的团队。
vocabulary.pinyin_example_zh: Wǒmen yōngyǒu yī zhī gāo jìnéng qiě jījí zhǔdòng de tuánduī.

activities.description: Practice introducing oneself and one's startup using a series of prompts. The student will describe their startup, their role, and why they need investment.  The AI will provide feedback on grammar, vocabulary, and fluency, generating appropriate responses.

prompts.prompt_en: Describe your startup in one sentence.
prompts.prompt_zh: 用一句话描述你的创业公司。
prompts.pinyin: Yòng yī juǎ zimiáo shù nǐ de chuàngyè gōngsī.

prompts.prompt_en: What is your role in the startup?
prompts.prompt_zh: 你在创业公司中担任什么角色？
prompts.pinyin: Nǐ zài chuàngyè gōngsī zhōng dānrèn shénme jiǎosè?
